ParameterFields.Name: Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The 'Spawned saltwater Octorok' type does not appear when manually placed, it's just for the spawner to create.

EnumValues: Saltwater Octorok that shoots at a certain range
Saltwater Octorok that spawns close to player and shoots after a certain delay
Saltwater Octorok that shoots after a certain delay
Rock shot by a freshwater Octorok

ParameterFields.Name: Projectile Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This only affects what freshwater Octoroks shoot, not saltwater ones.

ParameterFields.Name: Sight Range (Thousands)
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
For the 'Saltwater Octorok spawner' type, this number multiplied by 1000 is the range within it will notice the player and start spawning saltwater Octoroks.
No effect on other types besides the spawner.
